title: Incorrect rank rewards
body: I grinded last night (NOV 6) to Gold 5, I won my promos on nov 6 around 11pm, i logged in today expecting gold rewards but I got silver ones. What do I do?{{champion:32}}

replies.body: I'm not sure anyone has received rewards yet, so what are you looking at that makes you think you got Silver rewards? If it just a loading border then most likely it is still reflecting your last season rank and you simply haven't been issued this seasons yet.
